sentences.zh: 東從韓信攻龍且、留公旋於高密，卒斬龍且，生得右司馬、連尹各一人，樓煩將十人，身生得亞將周蘭。

translations.literal: East follow Han Xin attack Long Ju, Liu gong Xuan at Gao Mi, soldiers behead Long Ju, alive obtain right marshal, Lian Yin each one, Lou Fan general ten, personally alive obtain deputy general Zhou Lan.
translations.idiomatic: Following Han Xin east, he attacked Long Ju and Duke Liu Xuan at Gaomi. The soldiers beheaded Long Ju, captured alive one Right Marshal and one Lian Yin each, ten Loufan generals, and he personally captured deputy general Zhou Lan alive.

translations.literal: When Kai died, his son Han Sheng succeeded him. When Sheng died, his son Han Xin succeeded him. When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him. When Rong died, his son Han Qiang succeeded him. When Qiang died, his son Han Zhuang succeeded him. When Zhuang died, his son Han Hong succeeded him.

sentences.zh: 齊地已定，韓信自立為齊王，使嬰別將擊楚將公杲於魯北，破之。

translations.literal: Qi land already settle, Han Xin self establish as Qi wang, make Ying separately lead strike Chu general Gong Gao at Lu north, break it.
translations.idiomatic: Once the Qi lands were settled, Han Xin established himself as King of Qi and sent Ying to separately lead in striking Chu general Gong Gao north of Lu, breaking him.

sentences.zh: 轉南，破薛郡長，身虜騎將一人。

translations.literal: Turn south, break Xue commandery chief, personally capture cavalry general one.
translations.idiomatic: Turning south, he broke Xue commandery chief and personally captured one cavalry general.

sentences.zh: 攻（博）［傅］陽，前至下相以東南僮、取慮、徐。

translations.literal: Attack Fu Yang, advance arrive Xia Xiang southeast Tong, take Lu, Xu.
translations.idiomatic: He attacked Fuyang, advanced to southeast of Xiaxiang at Tong, and took Lu and Xu.

sentences.zh: 度淮，盡降其城邑，至廣陵。

translations.literal: Cross Huai, exhaust surrender their city towns, arrive Guang Ling.
translations.idiomatic: He crossed the Huai and completely surrendered their city towns, arriving at Guangling.

sentences.zh: 項羽使項聲、薛公、郯公復定淮北。

translations.literal: Xiang Yu make Xiang Sheng, Xue gong, Tan gong again settle Huai north.
translations.idiomatic: Xiang Yu sent Xiang Sheng, Duke Xue, and Duke Tan to again settle north of the Huai.

sentences.zh: 嬰度淮北，擊破項聲、郯公下邳，斬薛公，下下邳，擊破楚騎於平陽，遂降彭城，虜柱國項佗，降留、薛、沛、酂、蕭、相。

translations.literal: Ying cross Huai north, strike break Xiang Sheng, Tan gong Xia Pi, behead Xue gong, take Xia Pi, strike break Chu cavalry at Ping Yang, then surrender Peng Cheng, capture pillar state Xiang Tuo, surrender Liu, Xue, Pei, Zuo, Xiao, Xiang.
translations.idiomatic: Ying crossed north of the Huai, struck and broke Xiang Sheng and Duke Tan at Xiapi, beheaded Duke Xue, took Xiapi, struck and broke Chu cavalry at Pingyang, then surrendered Pengcheng, captured Pillar State Xiang Tuo, and surrendered Liu, Xue, Pei, Zuo, Xiao, and Xiang.

sentences.zh: 攻苦、譙，復得亞將周蘭。

translations.literal: Attack Ku, Qiao, again obtain deputy general Zhou Lan.
translations.idiomatic: He attacked Ku and Qiao, and again obtained deputy general Zhou Lan.

sentences.zh: 與漢王會頤鄉。

translations.literal: With Han wang meet Yi Xiang.
translations.idiomatic: He met with the Han king at Yixiang.

sentences.zh: 從擊項籍軍於陳下，破之，所將卒斬樓煩將二人，虜騎將八人。

translations.literal: Follow strike Xiang Ji army at Chen below, break it, what lead soldiers behead Lou Fan general two, capture cavalry general eight.
translations.idiomatic: He followed in striking Xiang Ji's army below Chen, broke it, and the soldiers he led beheaded two Loufan generals and captured eight cavalry generals.

sentences.zh: 賜益食邑二千五百戶。

translations.literal: Grant increase food fief two thousand five hundred households.
translations.idiomatic: He was granted an additional food fief of two thousand five hundred households.

translations.literal: When Hong died, his son Han Sheng succeeded him. When Sheng died, his son Han Wei succeeded him. When Wei died, his son Han Tao succeeded him. When Tao died, his son Han Jun succeeded him. When Jun died, his son Han Ji succeeded him. When Ji died, his son Han Quan succeeded him. When Quan died, his son Han Xun succeeded him. When Xun died, his son Han Bo succeeded him. When Bo died, his son Han Zhuang succeeded him. When Zhuang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

sentences.zh: 項籍敗垓下去也，嬰以御史大夫受詔將車騎別追項籍至東城，破之。

translations.literal: Xiang Ji defeat Gai Xia go, Ying with censor grand master receive decree lead chariots cavalry separately pursue Xiang Ji arrive Dong Cheng, break it.
translations.idiomatic: After Xiang Ji was defeated and fled from Gaixia, Ying as Censor Grand Master received a decree to lead chariots and cavalry separately pursuing Xiang Ji to Dongcheng, breaking him.

sentences.zh: 所將卒五人共斬項籍，皆賜爵列侯。

translations.literal: What lead soldiers five people together behead Xiang Ji, all grant nobility ranked marquis.
translations.idiomatic: Five of the soldiers he led together beheaded Xiang Ji, and all were granted the nobility rank of Ranked Marquis.

sentences.zh: 降左右司馬各一人，卒萬二千人，盡得其軍將吏。

translations.literal: Surrender left right marshals each one, soldiers twelve thousand, exhaust obtain their army generals officials.
translations.idiomatic: He surrendered one Left Marshal and one Right Marshal each, twelve thousand soldiers, and completely obtained their army's generals and officials.

sentences.zh: 下東城、歷陽。

translations.literal: Take Dong Cheng, Li Yang.
translations.idiomatic: He took Dongcheng and Liyang.

sentences.zh: 渡江，破吳郡長吳下，得吳守，遂定吳、豫章、會稽郡。

translations.literal: Cross Jiang, break Wu commandery chief Wu below, obtain Wu defender, then settle Wu, Yu Zhang, Hui Ji commanderies.
translations.idiomatic: He crossed the Jiang, broke Wu commandery chief below Wu, obtained the Wu defender, and thus settled the Wu, Yuzhang, and Huiji commanderies.

sentences.zh: 還定淮北，凡五十二縣。

translations.literal: Return settle Huai north, altogether fifty two counties.
translations.idiomatic: He returned to settle north of the Huai, for a total of fifty-two counties.

translations.literal: When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him. When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him. When Guang died, his son Han Chen succeeded him. When Chen died, his son Han Yan succeeded him. When Yan died, his son Han Tao succeeded him. When Tao died, his son Han Quan succeeded him.

sentences.zh: 漢王立為皇帝，賜益嬰邑三千戶。

translations.literal: Han wang establish as emperor, grant increase Ying fief three thousand households.
translations.idiomatic: The Han king was established as emperor, and granted Ying an additional fief of three thousand households.

sentences.zh: 其秋，以車騎將軍從擊破燕王臧荼。

translations.literal: Its autumn, with chariot cavalry general follow strike break Yan wang Zang Tu.
translations.idiomatic: That autumn, as Chariot Cavalry General he followed in striking and breaking Yan king Zang Tu.

sentences.zh: 明年，從至陳，取楚王信。

translations.literal: Next year, follow arrive Chen, take Chu wang Xin.
translations.idiomatic: The next year, he followed to Chen and took Chu king Xin.

sentences.zh: 還，剖符，世世勿絕，食潁陰二千五百戶，號曰潁陰侯。

translations.literal: Return, split tally, generation generation not cut off, food Ying Yin two thousand five hundred households, title called Ying Yin marquis.
translations.idiomatic: He returned, received a split tally for generations without end, food fief of two thousand five hundred households at Yingyin, and was titled Marquis of Yingyin.

translations.literal: When Quan died, his son Han Xin succeeded him. When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him. When Rong died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him. When Xiang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him.

sentences.zh: 以車騎將軍從擊反韓王信於代，至馬邑，受詔別降樓煩以北六縣，斬代左相，破胡騎於武泉北。

translations.literal: With chariot cavalry general follow strike rebel Han wang Xin at Dai, arrive Ma Yi, receive decree separately surrender Lou Fan north six counties, behead Dai left chancellor, break barbarian cavalry at Wu Quan north.
translations.idiomatic: As Chariot Cavalry General he followed in striking the rebelling Han king Xin at Dai, arrived at Maiyi, received a decree to separately surrender six counties north of Loufan, beheaded the Dai left chancellor, and broke barbarian cavalry north of Wuquan.

sentences.zh: 復從擊韓信胡騎晉陽下，所將卒斬胡白題將一人。

translations.literal: Again follow strike Han Xin barbarian cavalry Jin Yang below, what lead soldiers behead barbarian white forehead general one.
translations.idiomatic: He again followed in striking Han Xin's barbarian cavalry below Jinyang, and the soldiers he led beheaded one barbarian general with a white forehead mark.

sentences.zh: 受詔并將燕、趙、齊、梁、楚車騎，擊破胡騎於硰石。

translations.literal: Receive decree together lead Yan, Zhao, Qi, Liang, Chu chariots cavalry, strike break barbarian cavalry at Kong Shi.
translations.idiomatic: He received a decree to together lead the chariots and cavalry of Yan, Zhao, Qi, Liang, and Chu, striking and breaking barbarian cavalry at Kongshi.

sentences.zh: 至平城，為胡所圍，從還軍東垣。

translations.literal: Arrive Ping Cheng, be barbarian surrounded, follow return army Dong Yuan.
translations.idiomatic: He arrived at Pingcheng and was surrounded by barbarians, following in returning the army to Dongyuan.

translations.literal: When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him. When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him. When Guang died, his son Han Chen succeeded him. When Chen died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

sentences.zh: 從擊陳豨，受詔別攻豨丞相侯敞軍曲逆下，破之，卒斬敞及特將五人。

translations.literal: Follow strike Chen Xi, receive decree separately attack Xi chancellor Hou Chang army Qu Ni below, break it, soldiers behead Chang and special generals five.
translations.idiomatic: He followed in striking Chen Xi, received a decree to separately attack Xi's chancellor Hou Chang's army below Qu Ni, broke it, and the soldiers beheaded Chang and five special generals.

sentences.zh: 降曲逆、盧奴、上曲陽、安國、安平。

translations.literal: Surrender Qu Ni, Lu Nu, Shang Qu Yang, An Guo, An Ping.
translations.idiomatic: He surrendered Qu Ni, Lu Nu, Shang Qu Yang, An Guo, and An Ping.

sentences.zh: 攻下東垣。

translations.literal: Attack take Dong Yuan.
translations.idiomatic: He attacked and took Dongyuan.

translations.literal: When Yan died, his son Han Tao succeeded him. When Tao died, his son Han Quan succeeded him. When Quan died, his son Han Xin succeeded him.

sentences.zh: 黥布反，以車騎將軍先出，攻布別將於相，破之，斬亞將樓煩將三人。

translations.literal: Qing Bu rebel, with chariot cavalry general first out, attack Bu separate general at Xiang, break it, behead deputy general Lou Fan general three.
translations.idiomatic: When Qing Bu rebelled, as Chariot Cavalry General he went out first, attacked Bu's separate general at Xiang, broke him, and beheaded three deputy generals and Loufan generals.

sentences.zh: 又進擊破布上柱國軍及大司馬軍。

translations.literal: Again advance strike break Bu upper pillar state army and great marshal army.
translations.idiomatic: He again advanced and struck, breaking Bu's Upper Pillar State army and Great Marshal army.

sentences.zh: 又進破布別將肥誅。

translations.literal: Again advance break Bu separate general Fei Zhu.
translations.idiomatic: He again advanced and broke Bu's separate general Fei Zhu.

sentences.zh: 嬰身生得左司馬一人，所將卒斬其小將十人，追北至淮上。

translations.literal: Ying personally alive obtain left marshal one, what lead soldiers behead their small generals ten, pursue north arrive Huai above.
translations.idiomatic: Ying personally captured one Left Marshal alive, the soldiers he led beheaded ten of their small generals, and pursued north to the Huai.

sentences.zh: 益食二千五百戶。

translations.literal: Increase food two thousand five hundred households.
translations.idiomatic: He was granted an additional food fief of two thousand five hundred households.

sentences.zh: 布已破，高帝歸，定令嬰食穎陰五千戶，除前所食邑。

translations.literal: Bu already broken, Gao Di return, settle order Ying food Ying Yin five thousand households, remove previous food fief.
translations.idiomatic: After Bu was broken and the Gao Emperor returned, he settled on ordering Ying a food fief of five thousand households at Yingyin, removing his previous food fief.

sentences.zh: 凡從得二千石二人，別破軍十六，降城四十六，定國一，郡二，縣五十二，得將軍二人，柱國、相國各一人，二千石十人。

translations.literal: Altogether follow obtain two thousand stone two, separately break armies sixteen, surrender cities forty six, settle states one, commanderies two, counties fifty two, obtain generals two, pillar state, prime minister each one, two thousand stone ten.
translations.idiomatic: In total he followed and obtained two officials of two thousand stone, separately broke sixteen armies, surrendered forty-six cities, settled one state, two commanderies, and fifty-two counties, obtained two generals, one Pillar State and one Prime Minister each, and ten officials of two thousand stone.

translations.literal: When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him. When Rong died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him. When Xiang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him. When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him. When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him. When Guang died, his son Han Chen succeeded him. When Chen died, his son Han Yan succeeded him.

sentences.zh: 嬰自破布歸，高帝崩，嬰以列侯事孝惠帝及呂太后。

translations.literal: Ying from break Bu return, Gao Di collapse, Ying with ranked marquis serve Xiao Hui emperor and Lu empress dowager.
translations.idiomatic: After Ying returned from breaking Bu, the Gao Emperor collapsed, and Ying as Ranked Marquis served the Xiaohui emperor and Empress Dowager Lu.

sentences.zh: 太后崩，呂祿等以趙王自置為將軍，軍長安，為亂。

translations.literal: Empress dowager collapse, Lu Lu etc with Zhao wang self appoint as generals, army Chang An, make rebellion.
translations.idiomatic: After the Empress Dowager collapsed, Lu Lu and others, using the King of Zhao, appointed themselves generals, stationed troops at Chang'an, and caused rebellion.

sentences.zh: 齊哀王聞之，舉兵西，且入誅不當為王者。

translations.literal: Qi Ai wang hear it, raise troops west, and enter execute not should be wang ones.
translations.idiomatic: When the King of Qi Ai heard this, he raised troops and went west, intending to enter and execute those who should not be kings.

sentences.zh: 上將軍呂祿等聞之，乃遣嬰為大將，將軍往擊之。

translations.literal: Supreme general Lu Lu etc hear it, then send Ying as great general, lead army go strike it.
translations.idiomatic: The Supreme General Lu Lu and others heard this and sent Ying as great general to lead troops and go strike them.

sentences.zh: 嬰行至滎陽，乃與絳侯等謀，因屯兵滎陽，風齊王以誅呂氏事，齊兵止不前。

translations.literal: Ying march arrive Xing Yang, then with Jiang marquis etc plot, then station troops Xing Yang, secretly inform Qi wang with execute Lu clan matters, Qi troops stop not advance.
translations.idiomatic: Ying marched to Xingyang, then plotted with the Jiang marquis and others, stationed troops at Xingyang, and secretly informed the King of Qi about executing the Lu clan, so the Qi troops stopped and did not advance.

sentences.zh: 絳侯等既誅諸呂，齊王罷兵歸，嬰亦罷兵自滎陽歸，與絳侯、陳平共立代王為孝文皇帝。

translations.literal: Jiang marquis etc already execute various Lu, Qi wang disband troops return, Ying also disband troops from Xing Yang return, with Jiang marquis, Chen Ping together establish Dai wang as Xiao Wen emperor.
translations.idiomatic: After the Jiang marquis and others executed the various Lu clan members, the King of Qi disbanded his troops and returned. Ying also disbanded his troops and returned from Xingyang, together with the Jiang marquis and Chen Ping establishing the King of Dai as Emperor Xiaowen.

sentences.zh: 孝文皇帝於是益封嬰三千戶，賜黃金千斤，拜為太尉。

translations.literal: Xiao Wen emperor then increase enfeoff Ying three thousand households, grant yellow gold thousand jin, appoint as grand marshal.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Xiaowen then increased Ying's enfeoffment by three thousand households, granted him one thousand jin of yellow gold, and appointed him Grand Marshal.

translations.literal: When Yan died, his son Han Tao succeeded him. When Tao died, his son Han Quan succeeded him. When Xin died, his son Han Xin succeeded him. When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him. When Rong died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him. When Xiang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him. When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him.

sentences.zh: 三歲，絳侯勃免相就國，嬰為丞相，罷太尉官。

translations.literal: Three years, Jiang marquis Bo resign chancellor go to state, Ying become chancellor, dismiss grand marshal office.
translations.idiomatic: After three years, the Jiang marquis Bo resigned as chancellor and went to his state. Ying became chancellor and dismissed his grand marshal office.

sentences.zh: 是歲，匈奴大入北地、上郡，令丞相嬰將騎八萬五千往擊匈奴。

translations.literal: This year, Xiongnu greatly enter Bei Di, Shang jun, order chancellor Ying lead cavalry eighty five thousand go strike Xiongnu.
translations.idiomatic: That year, the Xiongnu greatly entered Beidi and Shangjun. They ordered Chancellor Ying to lead eighty-five thousand cavalry to go strike the Xiongnu.

sentences.zh: 匈奴去，濟北王反，詔乃罷嬰之兵。

translations.literal: Xiongnu go, Ji Bei wang rebel, decree then dismiss Ying of troops.
translations.idiomatic: The Xiongnu left, but the King of Jibei rebelled, so the decree dismissed Ying's troops.

sentences.zh: 後歲餘，嬰以丞相卒，謚曰懿侯。

translations.literal: After year more, Ying with chancellor die, posthumous title called Yi marquis.
translations.idiomatic: After more than a year, Ying died as chancellor, posthumously titled Marquis Yi.

sentences.zh: 子平侯阿代侯。

translations.literal: Son Ping marquis A replace marquis.
translations.idiomatic: His son A succeeded as Marquis Ping.

sentences.zh: 二十八年卒，子彊代侯。

translations.literal: Twenty eight years die, son Jiang replace marquis.
translations.idiomatic: He died after twenty-eight years, and his son Jiang succeeded as marquis.

sentences.zh: 十三年，彊有罪，絕二歲。

translations.literal: Thirteen years, Jiang have crime, cut off two years.
translations.idiomatic: After thirteen years, Jiang committed a crime and the line was cut off for two years.

sentences.zh: 元光三年，天子封灌嬰孫賢為臨汝侯，續灌氏後，八歲，坐行賕有罪，國除。

translations.literal: Yuan Guang three year, Son of Heaven enfeoff Guan Ying grandson Xian as Lin Ru marquis, continue Guan clan after, eight years, sit practice bribe have crime, state eliminate.
translations.idiomatic: In the third year of Yuanguang, the Son of Heaven enfeoffed Guan Ying's grandson Xian as Marquis of Linru to continue the Guan clan lineage. After eight years, convicted of bribery, the state was abolished.

translations.literal: When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him. When Guang died, his son Han Chen succeeded him. When Chen died, his son Han Yan succeeded him. When Yan died, his son Han Tao succeeded him. When Tao died, his son Han Quan succeeded him. When Xin died, his son Han Xin succeeded him. When Xin died, his son Han Rong succeeded him. When Rong died, his son Han Xiang succeeded him.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：吾適豐沛，問其遺老，觀故蕭、曹、樊噲、滕公之家，及其素，異哉所聞！

translations.literal: Grand Historian say: I visit Feng Pei, ask their surviving elders, observe former Xiao, Cao, Fan Kuai, Teng gong of homes, and their plainness, different what heard!
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian says: I visited Feng and Pei, asked their surviving elders, observed the former homes of Xiao, Cao, Fan Kuai, and Duke Teng, and their plainness. How different from what I had heard!

sentences.zh: 方其鼓刀屠狗賣繒之時，豈自知附驥之尾，垂名漢廷，德流子孫哉？

translations.literal: When their beat knife butcher dogs sell silk time, how self know attach fine horse tail, hang name Han court, virtue flow descendants?
translations.idiomatic: When they were beating knives, butchering dogs, and selling silk, how could they have known they would attach to the tail of a fine horse, hang their names in the Han court, and have their virtue flow to their descendants?

sentences.zh: 余與他廣通，為言高祖功臣之興時若此云。

translations.literal: I with Ta Guang communicate, for speak Gao Zu merit ministers of rise time like this cloud.
translations.idiomatic: I communicated with Ta Guang in order to speak of how Gaozu's merit ministers rose in such times.

translations.literal: When Xiang died, his son Han Jie succeeded him. When Jie died, his son Han Yong succeeded him. When Yong died, his son Han Guang succeeded him.
